results.title: Little echo lost
results.creator_credit: Armagan Ballantyne, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
results.brief_description: The EchoMan has never questioned his existence till now. One day he witnesses an event that brings into question everything he stands for and believes in. Stars Hugo Weaving as the EchoMan and Alana de Roma as the young girl. Original format 35mm.

results.title: A Horse with stripes
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Andrew Ross and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Manicured lawns…immaculate houses…clean streets…but beneath this highly desirable exterior lurks the desperation of the bored, the scared, the paranoid and the violent. And when the tranquil suburban life of the Goldings and the Bates deteriorates into chaos, they choose not to speak about it. Winner of Silver Hugo, Best short drama, Chicago International Film Festival, USA, 1991.

results.title: Flying over mother
results.creator_credit: Michael James Rowland, Melanie Coombs and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
1. Vladimir is growing up on an isolated farm somewhere on the Russian Steppes. He has been brought up on his mother’s stories of all the dangers that lie in wait for boys who misbehave and he is trying - not very successfully - to overcome his fears. But one day something happens that will change the direction of his life.
  2. Vladimir has finally reached his goal - he has trained as a cosmonaut and is circling the earth. But unfortunately his capsule has malfunctioned and things don’t look so good for him…

results.title: Roadside cafe
results.brief_description: A lonely young woman working in an isolated roadhouse is desperate to escape the inevitability of her future. She makes hopeful overtures toward the only people that she meets - the truckies and families who frequent the cafe but is met with ugliness and hostility. Cast features LeVerne McDonnell. Original format 16mm/colour.

results.title: Wild planet
results.brief_description: George Bonicelli is an unassuming, naive and likable accountant who has his routine and mundane existence briefly injected with a large dose of fear, exhilaration, speed, colour, movement, liberation and a hint of romance when he runs into Leilah Deluxe, a 340 year old woman from the planet Ultra Terra. Original format 16 mm/colour.

results.title: Surface tension
results.creator_credit: Karena Slaninka, Moira Moss and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Freida has something to tell Nick, but she doesn’t know what she feels or how to express it. The unspoken is the source of a tension that grows and grows and eventually must burst like a bubble rising to the surface. Original format 16mm.

results.title: Zipper: great moments in art and fashion
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description: Live action, choreography, animation and painting combine in a breathless trip through 20th century images in art and fashion - as you may not have seen them before. Voiceover presented by Arthur Dignam.

results.title: Mozzie
results.creator_credit: Dylan Yeo, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Spectacular animation about fluorocarbons, global warming and radical brain surgery. An evil entrepreneur discovers the real price of his actions. Combined live action and computer animation. Written, directed and animated by Dylan Yeo. Original format 35mm/colour.

results.title: Milk
results.creator_credit: Mairi Cameron, Jane Keneally, AFTRS and Anthony Johnsen
results.brief_description: The Old Man lives on his own, and has done so for as long as he can remember. He doesn’t go out except to buy milk. The Downstairs Woman lives directly below. Every evening she comes home from work, walks upstairs and borrows a jug of milk.
